titleStmt.title: 1954 Colorado V Nebraska Description, Press and Radio Release

distributor.name: Center for Digital Research in the Humanities

bibl.title: 1954 Colorado V Nebraska Description, Press and Radio Release

msIdentifier.repository: Archives & Special Collections, University of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries

div1.p: Hash to hash on Male Heil D

list.item: 1. Hash to hash on Hail Nebraska
2. Form BUFFALO on Glory, Glory, Colorado
3. Play Bb9 chord and two Bunny Hops into diamonds

4. Around diamond on double eagle
4. Circles on Chief of Staff 16 measures
5. Into Hexagon on March of Cornhuskers 8 measures without into
6. Around Hexagon and to the rear on Champions

7. Form Company Fronts on March of Cornhuskers
play 4 measures 4 dead counts play next 4 measures
8. Play and Sing Band Song and Hail Varsity
9. On last half of Heil Varsity return to Hexagon
10. ON Thunder and Blazes trio Perpendiculars go out 16 counts to the rear and return when back do circles around every 4th man for last half of Trio
11. Back to Diamonds on March of Cornhusker 8 measures and stop play chord

div1.p:
PRESS and RADIO RELEASE
University of Nebraska Band
Colorado - Nebraska Game - Oct. 23, 1954

row.cell:
The band presents a drill of
contrasting geometric designs

In three company fronts,
the Band sings.

Double Eagle
March of the Cornhuskers

Twelve trumpet soloists are now
featured

div1.p:
Donald A. Lentz
Director of University Bands
